title: Page layout programs used for Newspapers
content:
I know Quark and Indesign are used for publication design. But are their any other programs used in newspaper design? I recently read in a blog (Newsdesigner.com) that if someone use InDesign to design an entire newspaper you would have the Sunday Times on Thursday evening. Are there other pagination programs out there?
